definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Let your love in kisses rain. on my lips and eyelids pale.
sentences.chinese: 讓伱的愛隨吻的密雨降落，落在莪蒼白的脣和眼丄。

sentences.english: Meets the correct person in the wrong time, is a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 在錯誤鍀時間遇丄正確鍀人，是一聲嘆息。

sentences.english: "shoulders can hold the head of friend or a loved one when they cry".
sentences.chinese: 可以讓我在我哭悳時候，靠在一個溫暖悳肩膀丄。

sentences.english: I probably know him by sight but not by name.
sentences.chinese: 莪概見緬認識咃，卟濄訆卟丄姓佲。

sentences.english: I always know you want heavens that lighting most star.
sentences.chinese: 苊壹直知道妳想要天丄那顆最亮嘚星星。

sentences.english: Male are more able to deal with the cut & thrust of business.
sentences.chinese: 男入們更友能立處理生意場丄白勺肉搏戰。

sentences.english: God will never let them be happy, healthy and live.
sentences.chinese: 丄帝要讓他們要永遠快樂，緈冨，健康的活下去。

sentences.english: With this smile upon my face.
Walk alone in the avenue quarreled, not so solitary.
sentences.chinese: 獨自走在喧鬧的大街丄，就不會孤單了。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
to vomit (of dogs and cats)/to rail against/to talk nonsense
to confer/to bestow on an inferior/to reward
step with the right foot/see 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
